title: "We will work to remove fertilizer jihad..." CM Himanta Sarma highlights ill effects of fertilizers
selftext: Had to check twice whether it is real or some satarical website. God save us from such politicians
comments: The what? Now they're not even putting any effort to act serious.
I thought it was just a sarcasm but Muslims really do seem to live rent-free in way too many Hindu brains!
